017
018package com.github.tommyettinger.kryo.jdkgdxds;
019
020import com.esotericsoftware.kryo.Kryo;
021import com.esotericsoftware.kryo.io.Input;
022import com.esotericsoftware.kryo.io.Output;
023import com.esotericsoftware.kryo.serializers.CollectionSerializer;
024import com.github.tommyettinger.ds.FilteredIterableSet;
025import com.github.tommyettinger.ds.FilteredIterableSet;
026import com.github.tommyettinger.function.ObjPredicate;
027import com.github.tommyettinger.function.ObjToObjFunction;
028import com.github.tommyettinger.function.ObjToSameFunction;
029
030import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
031
032public class FilteredIterableSetSerializer extends CollectionSerializer<FilteredIterableSet<?, ?>> {
033    public FilteredIterableSetSerializer() {
034        super();
035        setElementsCanBeNull(false);
036    }
037
038    @Override
039    protected void writeHeader(Kryo kryo, Output output, FilteredIterableSet<?, ?> collection) {
040        ObjPredicate<?> filter = collection.getFilter();
041        ObjToSameFunction<?> editor = collection.getEditor();
042        if(filter == null || editor == null)
043            throw new NoSuchElementException("A FilteredIterableSet must have a non-null filter and editor to be serialized.");
044        if(kryo.getClassResolver().getRegistration(filter.getClass()) == null)
045            kryo.register(filter.getClass());
046        if(kryo.getClassResolver().getRegistration(editor.getClass()) == null)
047            kryo.register(editor.getClass());
048        kryo.writeClassAndObject(output, filter);
049        kryo.writeClassAndObject(output, editor);
050    }
051
052    @SuppressWarnings({"unchecked", "rawtypes"})
053    @Override
054    protected FilteredIterableSet<?, ?> create(Kryo kryo, Input input, Class<? extends FilteredIterableSet<?, ?>> type, int size) {
055        return new FilteredIterableSet((ObjPredicate<?>)kryo.readClassAndObject(input), (ObjToSameFunction<?>) kryo.readClassAndObject(input), size);
056    }
057
058    @SuppressWarnings({"rawtypes", "unchecked"})
059    @Override
060    protected FilteredIterableSet<?, ?> createCopy(Kryo kryo, FilteredIterableSet original) {
061        return new FilteredIterableSet(original.getFilter(), original.getEditor(), original.size(), original.getLoadFactor());
062    }
063}
